outputs Package¶

ioutput Module¶

Created on Aug 5, 2012

@author: Gary

class housemonitor.outputs.ioutput.iOutput[source]¶

Bases: lib.base.Base

This is an abstract class for outputting data.

output(value, data, listeners)[source]¶

This routine will be called to convert value from one unit to another such as Centigrade to Fahrenheit.

Parameters:
  • value (Boolean) – Not used
  • data – a dictionary containing more information about the value.
  • listeners – a list of the subscribed routines to send the data to
Returns:

value, data, listeners
Return type:

Boolean, dict, listeners
topic_name[source]¶

output(value, data, listeners)[source]¶

This routine will output a log of data that it receives

Args:
value: the value for the data data: more information about the value listeners: the various listeners for this object
Return:
the string that is printed
